result.name: 2009-defra-mb0102-2c-distribution-of-coastal-saltmarsh-from-polygon-data-in-the-united-kingdom-2
result.notes:
This layer shows the distribution of polygon records of coastal saltmarsh, a Biodiversity Action Plan Habitat.
      
      This layer forms one of a set of data layers created for the Defra MB0102 contract.  This work will support the delivery of a network of Marine Protected Areas as required to meet existing international and national obligations and commitments, including Marine Conservation Zones (MCZs), a new measure to be delivered as part of the Marine and Coastal Access Bill, and equivalent measures under Scottish legislation.  The availability of these data layers will also be of importance in underpinning Marine Planning (e.g. licensing) in our marine area.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: 2009 Defra MB0102 2C Distribution of coastal saltmarsh (from polygon data) in the United Kingdom and Isle of Man

extras.value: ["Freely Available via MEDIN Data Archive Centre with the exception of Native oyster (Ostrea edulis); Carbonate Mounds; Cold-water coral reefs where Public version must be gridded (10 km square grid resolution)."]
Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs (DEFRA) (originator, custodian)
